name: 2nd ESP Conference
content: English for Specific Purposes has now gained substantial body of practice and disciplinary research that differentiate it as an authentic area within the corpus of the study of English language as ultimately responsive to the realities of the professional and scientific surrounding spanning the world. There is a notable emergence of dedicated publications, special interest groups, trainings, conventions. With this conference we aim to explore what efforts and on whose side are needed to have ESP developed and incorporated into educational policies and universities curricula.
